summary: Reorganizing base mechanics with some additions: resolution, stress/fallout, volatility, resistance, experience.

sections.title: Highlight Popup Function
sections.description: Highlighting text on desktop now shows a popup with options to copy, export to link, or report an issue.

sections.title: Versioning System
sections.description: Site now displays current version of the project and posts release notes for each feature update.

sections.title: Documentation
sections.description: Finished welcome lore guide, consolidated volatility notes, added experience points page, and created a Resistance helper graphic.
